writer.name: 玛西亚·史密斯 Marcia Smith

director.name: 斯坦利·尼尔森 Stanley Nelson
马尔科·威廉姆斯 Marco Williams

this_title: Tell Them We Are Rising: The Story of Black Colleges and Universities
trans_title: 告诉他们我们正在崛起：黑人学院和大学的故事
introduction: A haven for Black intellectuals, artists and revolutionaries—and path of promise toward the American dream—Black colleges and universities have educated the architects of freedom movements and cultivated leaders in every field. They have been unapologetically Black for 150 years. For the first time ever, their story is told.
chinese_title: 告诉他们我们正在崛起：黑人学院和大学的故事
foreign_title: Tell Them We Are Rising: The Story of Black Colleges and Universities
